Description.Name: Wake me up before you go go
Description.Details:
The battle was a rough one, but in the end, your company prevailed.  You watch as your employer's medics check over the rescued hostages and conduct triage amongst the smoke and ruins.

A hover-gurney laden with a badly wounded mechwarrior approaches you.  The medic stops in front of you and consults a datapad, "Are you Commander {Commander.LastName}?

You look from the medic to the hover-gurney and back, "Yes, I am Commander {Commander.LastName}.  Is there something you need?"

The medic hands you the datapad and points at the screen, "If you would please sign there, and there, and initial here, here and here."

You read over the data on the pad, "What exactly am I signing for, and why are you asking me to sign this?"

The medic looks confused, "Just following orders, sir.  I was instructed to bring this patient to you and sign him over to your company.  My understanding is the last medivac dropship has left and this patient is too wounded to get him to the dropship prior to it lifting off.  If he stays here, he will succumb to his wounds."

You look at the state of the patient, currently in  a medically induced coma to nullify the shear pain this man must be going though.  You sign off on the datapad and hand it back to the medic, "Thank you.  We will take good care of the patient."

Description.Name: Administer Basic Medical Care
Description.Details: up to [¢250000] [Argo MedBay1]

Description.Name: Basic Medical
Description.Details:
You watch as the medic departs, then look down at the patient who's life now depends on you.  You activate the hover-gurney and head back towards your own dropship.  

When you arrive, Darius greets you at the ramp, "Who's this, Commander?"

Looking down at the patient, you shake your head, "I wish I knew, Darius.  I guess we will find that out when they awaken.  For now, put them in one of the standard beds in MedBay One."

<color=#E62E00>An unknown mechwarrior has been added to the Barracks and is currently in MedBay One</color>
